channel.title: Help plz
channel.description:
k, ive downloaded an source, but now i edited it alot.
so after i done all the editing work i wanted to put it online so i changed all in no-ip and 127.0.0.1 to my no-ip, i did this in client and server.
i also did in the client of the source. so wen i run it i still only can log in into 127.0.0.1 or nothing. but i cant log in in my no-ip and other people either.
i already did portforwarding i already compiled cause most people think i forgot that. so wat i need to do?

item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @tman915 tman915
item.description:
@tman915 wrote:

I did the same thing,
exactly.
And it didn’t work.
so what i did is redownloaded everything, and only changed the clients server ip under “gui.java”.
Try only changing the server ip in the “gui.java” folder in the client.
(make it your no-ip)

Read full topic
